scripts.build:api: yarn && cd api && yarn && cd .. && ncc build api/index.ts -e aws-sdk -o api/dist
scripts.db:import: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env DEBUG=task* dotenv -e api/.env -- ncc run api/tasks/dbImport.ts
scripts.dev:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env DEBUG=api* dotenv -e api/.env -- ncc run api/index.ts -w
scripts.es:create: cross-env DEBUG=task* dotenv -e api/.env -- ncc run api/tasks/createIndex.ts
scripts.es:delete: cross-env DEBUG=task* dotenv -e api/.env -- ncc run api/tasks/deleteIndex.ts
scripts.es:import: cross-env DEBUG=task* dotenv -e api/.env -- ncc run api/tasks/bulkImport.ts
